attributes.action: All school staff should have basic training in SEN needs
attributes.additional_details: So that more Sen children are helped on their learning journey and not ignored or put in isolation or detention because they struggle to communicate easily. To be more understanding of school avoidance , to create workshops in school breaks and lunch times so Sen children can have extra help with social and emotion health skills to stop bullying and to make the school environment more manageable .
attributes.background: To have all staff able to understand special needs children in mainstream school settings and how to handle the social and emotion health for children who struggle with emotions and social ques

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Regular SEN training for educational staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649405
